statements: SELECT * FROM User_Feedback
SELECT feedback_id, feedback_text, rating FROM User_Feedback WHERE rating > 4
SELECT user_id, virtual_assistant_id, feedback_text FROM User_Feedback WHERE user_id = 123
SELECT * FROM User_Feedback ORDER BY rating DESC
SELECT AVG(rating) AS average_rating FROM User_Feedback
SELECT * FROM User_Feedback WHERE rating > 3 ORDER BY feedback_id DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT user_id, feedback_text FROM User_Feedback WHERE user_id = 1001 ORDER BY feedback_id ASC
SELECT feedback_id, rating FROM User_Feedback WHERE virtual_assistant_id = 5002 ORDER BY rating DESC
SELECT user_id, feedback_text, rating FROM User_Feedback WHERE rating < 2.5 ORDER BY user_id ASC
SELECT virtual_assistant_id, COUNT(*) AS feedback_count FROM User_Feedback GROUP BY virtual_assistant_id HAVING COUNT(*) > 2 ORDER BY feedback_count DESC
SELECT * FROM UserFeedback;
SELECT feedback_text, rating FROM UserFeedback WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT assistant_id, average_rating, last_updated FROM AssistantRating WHERE total_ratings >= 100;
SELECT user_id, COUNT(*) AS feedback_count FROM UserFeedback GROUP BY user_id ORDER BY feedback_count DESC;
SELECT * FROM AssistantRating ORDER BY last_updated DESC;
SELECT id, user_id, feedback_text, rating FROM UserFeedback WHERE rating > 3
SELECT assistant_id, COUNT(id) AS total_feedback FROM UserFeedback GROUP BY assistant_id ORDER BY total_feedback DESC
SELECT assistant_id, AVG(rating) AS avg_rating FROM UserFeedback GROUP BY assistant_id HAVING AVG(rating) > 4
SELECT * FROM UserFeedback WHERE feedback_text LIKE '%improve%' OR feedback_text LIKE '%suggestions%'
SELECT assistant_id, MAX(total_ratings) AS max_ratings FROM AssistantRating
SELECT * FROM user_feedback;
SELECT feedback_text, rating FROM user_feedback WHERE rating > 3;
SELECT user_id, assistant_id FROM user_ratings ORDER BY rating_value DESC;
SELECT assistant_name, creation_date FROM virtual_assistants WHERE assistant_type = 'Chatbot';
SELECT * FROM user_feedback WHERE feedback_text IS NOT NULL AND rating IS NOT NULL;
SELECT * FROM user_feedback ORDER BY feedback_id DESC;
SELECT user_id, assistant_id, feedback_text FROM user_feedback WHERE rating > 3;
SELECT assistant_name, assistant_type FROM virtual_assistants ORDER BY assistant_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM user_ratings WHERE user_id = 101 AND assistant_id = 3;
SELECT user_id, assistant_id, rating_value FROM user_ratings WHERE rating_value BETWEEN 2 AND 4;
SELECT * FROM UserFeedback WHERE rating > 3;
SELECT user_id, feedback_text FROM UserFeedback WHERE assistant_id = 2;
SELECT assistant_name, assistant_type, created_at FROM AssistantDetails;
SELECT user_name, email FROM User WHERE phone_number LIKE '%123%';
SELECT rating_id, metric_name, description FROM RatingMetrics;
SELECT * FROM UserFeedback;
SELECT feedback_text, rating FROM UserFeedback WHERE rating > 3;
SELECT user_name, email FROM User JOIN UserFeedback ON User.user_id = UserFeedback.user_id WHERE feedback_text LIKE '%improvement%';
SELECT assistant_name, assistant_type FROM AssistantDetails WHERE created_at > '2021-01-01';
SELECT metric_name, description FROM RatingMetrics ORDER BY metric_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM UserFeedback;
SELECT user_id, feedback_text FROM UserFeedback ORDER BY user_id DESC;
SELECT first_name, last_name FROM Users WHERE email LIKE '%@example.com';
SELECT assistant_name, department FROM Assistants JOIN Departments ON Assistants.department = Departments.department_name;
SELECT user_id, COUNT(rating_id) AS total_ratings FROM UserRatings GROUP BY user_id HAVING total_ratings > 5;
SELECT * FROM UserFeedback WHERE rating > 4;
SELECT first_name, last_name, email FROM Users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT assistant_name, department FROM Assistants WHERE assistant_id IN (SELECT assistant_id FROM UserRatings WHERE rating_value = 5);
SELECT user_id, assistant_id, rating_value FROM UserRatings WHERE rating_value BETWEEN 3 AND 5 ORDER BY rating_value DESC;
SELECT department_name, COUNT(assistant_id) AS num_assistants FROM Assistants INNER JOIN Departments ON Assistants.department = Departments.department_name GROUP BY department_name;
